flawed_nl_solution:
He got 4*50=$2000<<4*50=2000>>2000
That means he was able to buy 2000/20=<<2000/20=100>>100 birds
Since each bird has 2 wings he got 100*2=<<100*2=200>>200 wings

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 200, not 2000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
